DataElement.preferredDefinition: Vital signs (such as height, weight, and blood pressure) directly measure an individual's current state of attributes.:A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A set of characters used as a code that is unique in the context or the system for which it is created. It serves as a means of identification and reference (often instead of a name) for an entity, person, thing, function, procedure, activity, variable, or body of data.:A set of characters used as a code that is unique in the context or the system for which it is created. It serves as a means of identification and reference (often instead of a name) for an entity, person, thing, function, procedure, activity, variable, or body of data._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.
